text: Allah waapele chilanga awala waakulupilile mwa jenumanja ni kutendaga yambone chanti; chisimu chene chiwatende kuwa wawinjila pachilambo (mâ€™malo mwa akulamula walelowa) mpela yawatite pakwatenda kuwa wawinjila awala wapaujo pao, soni chisimu chene tiwalimbanganyichisye dini jao ajila jawasagulile (Usilamu), ni tiwatindanichisye kwene panyuma pa woga wao pakwapa ntunjelele, (mutalonjelele kuwa) ali nkungalagatila Une, ni ngaamwanganyaga ni chilichose.
